items.title: 74 smallcaps gain between 10-40% as broader indices outperform
items.description: Among sectors, BSE Metal index added nearly 6 percent, BSE Auto index rose 5.2 percent, BSE Consumer Discretionary index gained 3.6 percent, while BSE Information Technology index shed 1 percent.

items.title: Markets gain on strong macro data, GST rate cuts; rupee hits fresh low
items.description: On the other hand, Domestic Institutional Investors (DII) continued their buying in 21st consecutive week, as they bought equities worth Rs 13,444.09 crore.

items.title: Buy Triveni Turbine; target of Rs 700: Mirae Asset Sharekhan
items.description: Mirae Asset Sharekhan is bullish on Triveni Turbine has recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 700 in its research report dated September 04, 2025.

items.title: Buy Maruti Suzuki; target of Rs 17,000 : ICICI Securities
items.description: ICICI Securities is bullish on Maruti Suzuki recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 17,000 in its research report dated September 05, 2025.
